sn7.7:4.2: Atha kho suddhikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn7.7:4.4: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn7.7:4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho suddhikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavato santike imaṃ gāthaṃ ajjhabhāsi:
sn7.7:5.1: “Na brāhmaṇo sujjhati koci,
sn7.7:5.4: So sujjhati na aññā itarā pajā”ti.
sn7.7:8.1: Evaṃ vutte, suddhikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn7.7:8.3: aññataro ca panāyasmā bhāradvājo arahataṃ ahosīti.
